Cryptocurrencies are a subset of digital assets.

Not in the KYC/AML way that is being forced on me. Overstock never even attempted to fill my order. They immediately sent my Bitcoin to Coinbase who won’t return it unless I create a VERIFIED account with them. Want your Bitcoin back? Let us KYC you. # extortion

Cave to extortion? That enables this type of behavior. I bet they do it regularly at the $500 mark. That’s probably the sweet spot where people start to get panicky and will do whatever is demanded in order to get their money back. Not happening. Return my # Bitcoin, Overstock.

Plus they won’t release the funds unless I create a VERIFIED account with them. They are extorting me for KYC on # Bitcoin that I already owned.
